title: We need pool party ashe in 2020
body:
Am I the only one waiting for pool party ashe this year?
plz riot 2020 {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: insta buy!!! I need my babe ashe with pool party skin, I already have miss fortune and caitlyn {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

I made a commitment long ago that I would buy any female human pool party skins as long as I play the game and have money to spend on games. I would love a pool party Ashe skin.

What would her weapon be? Like an oddly shaped foam noodle firing arrows made of water instead of ice?

Maybe a nerf bow or something 
https://sgwproductimages.azureedge.net/191/11-11-2019/26176011113052rdll.jpg
Unfortunate that Jinx already got the heartseeker skin. Pool Party Jinx needs to happen asap.
